title: Ukraine’s Zelenskyy moves to replace Reznikov in defence shake-up
description: Zelenskyy will ask his parliament to replace Oleksii Reznikov with Rustem Umerov, head of Ukraine's State Property Fund.

title: What’s behind outbreak of violence in Kirkuk?
description: Several killed in unrest between ethnic communities in Iraqi city.

title: Israel’s Netanyahu calls for deportation of Eritrean refugee ‘rioters’
description: Israeli PM also requested that ministers present him with plans 'for the removal of all the other illegal infiltrators'.

title: Death at Burning Man investigated in US, thousands stranded by flooding
description: Thousands of festivalgoers remain stranded as organisers close vehicular traffic following storm flooding in Nevada.

title: Gaza’s calligraffiti of hope
description: Ayman al-Hosari decided to make the destruction around him into canvases that speak volumes about living in Gaza.

title: Heath Streak, former Zimbabwe cricket captain, dies aged 49
description: Zimbabwe's all-time leading wicket-taker dies after a battle with cancer.

title: African Climate Summit: An opportunity to decolonise Africa’s energy
description: African leaders should use the gathering in Nairobi to chart the course for a renewable energy revolution.

title: Typhoon Haikui makes landfall in Taiwan, unleashing rain and fierce winds
description: Mass evacuations, cancelled flights as storm plunges thousands of households into darkness.

title: Africa faces ‘climate risk blind spot’ amid lack of weather radar
description: Vast expanse of the 54-nation continent is relatively unserved and unwarned by inadequate weather forecasts.

title: Saudi Arabia’s e-sports looking to nurture its own hit games
description: The kingdom is making investments and training new local talent as it aims to become a powerhouse in game development.

title: Luol Deng: Uniting a country through basketball
description: Former NBA star Luol Deng on building the South Sudan basketball team and why he believes sport can change lives.

title: Iran’s ambassador to Saudi Arabia to depart for Riyadh
description: The Iranian embassy reopened in June, and the ambassador is expected to be fully situated there within days.

title: Over a dozen arrested in Cyprus as anti-migrant violence spreads
description: Five people injured, migrants and refugees attacked on Friday when an anti-migrant march turned violent in Limassol.

title: What’s at stake in the upcoming Erdogan-Putin meeting?
description: Monday’s meeting in Sochi comes amid international efforts to patch up the Black Sea Grain Initiative.

title: Photos: Huge protests in Niger demand French forces to leave
description: Coup leaders also ordered the 'expulsion' of France's Ambassador Sylvain Itte, who has shown no sign of leaving.

title: Australia to send more police to Solomon Islands, extend mission
description: Australian mission will help boost security for the upcoming Pacific Games as well as next year's general elections.

title: Russia-Ukraine war: List of key events, day 557
description: These are the main developments as the Russian invasion of Ukraine enters its 557th day.

title: N Korea stages ‘tactical nuclear attack drill’ in warning to enemies
description: Pyongyang says it carried out a nuclear attack drill with mock atomic warheads attached to two long-range missiles.

title: Biden surveys Hurricane Idalia damage in Florida; DeSantis snubs meeting
description: US president pledges support for Florida after snub by Governor Ron DeSantis, a potential presidential rival.
